title: Living in Grace: The Shift to Spiritual Perception
description: Living in Grace: The Shift to Spiritual Perception is a memorable complete guide on how to transform the quality of our lives, to live the life we've always wanted; to know contentment, authenticity, & be present in Grace. This book is a profound, thought-provoking guide to shifting perceptions to reveal what is hidden in plain sight: heaven on earth.
author: Beca Lewis
